pages.text: Syllipsimopodi is an early cephalopod from the Carboniferous period. It was a vampyropod, meaning that it was closely related to vampire squids and octopi. They had 10 arms, with 2 of them being much longer than the others.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Eggs/Bucket
